11ty Midnight Blog Starter

03 Sep 2023

Minimalist dark mode starter template for 11ty with support for jsfiddle embeds and prismjs syntax highlighting.

Design very based on this 11ty starter from @sidswork https://github.com/sidswork/11ty-midnight.git
